quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn’t take.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
quotes.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

quotes.quote: It is not how old you are, but how you are old.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: When you go through deep waters, I will be with you.
quotes.author: Isaiah 43:2

quotes.quote: We can do no great things, only small things with great love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Dreams don't work unless you do.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Good things come to those who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney
